name: Shroom Swap
description:
DISCLAIMER: Web mode only works with single player.

Controller input works with downloadable files.

This is a fun little remake of mushroom mixup, made for the game devs remake mario party challenge hosted by the devlogs club.

Controls: Jump, Move, Pound(in mid-air).

Controler support is a bit wonk, so you may have to mess around with the buttons to find out what does what. If a certain type of controller isn't working, leave a comment about it, so I can fix it ASAP.

I hope you enjoy this silly little remake, and watch my devlog on it:

- Made with love
